RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OCEAN KISS briefly vied for the lead, settled off of the leaders, raced in the three path, stalked down the back side, inched into the four path and launched a bid at the three eighths pole, was given the cue and responded well by forging to the front, drew beside the front runner, drifted out and raced in the four path down the stretch, battled with a foe who was on the rail, was still slugging it out for the lead at the sixteenth pole, OCEAN KISS angled back towards the fence and finally switched leads, as he pushed past his rival and took the lead and the win. VERO CAMPIONE vied for the lead, took the rail, set the fractions, was in control and racing on the rail in the stretch, was challenged by a closing rival, battled down the stretch but just missed late. VALID EARLY was off a tad bit slow, raced in the four path, found his stride by the half mile pole, edged out and circled the field through the turn, was kept on point and was able to getup for third. TRIPLE raced off of the pace, traveled in the four path, shifted out at the quarter pole and closed with a mild bid. ZAPAWAY vied for the lead, stalked the pace setters in the three path, raced in between horses ,angled into the four path and tired in the stretch. ALPHIN vied for the lead, matched strides with another foe and led in company, raced in the two path, faltered. SOMMELIER was off slow and heavily encouraged out of the gates, shuffled over to the rail where he made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Triple
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 4w, shifted out 1/4, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Ocean Kiss
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, between, settled, bid 3/8, split, cleared, drifted, up

ENTRY.NAME: Sommelier
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, encouraged early, rail, made no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRYSTAL CRESCENT raced in the three path and took control of the race early, set the pace as he rated in hands, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, was asked and responded well, drew off at the quarter pole and was hand ridden in the lane for the easy win. PREACH IT GIRL stalked the early leader from the five path, advanced down the back side joining the leaders at the half mile pole, stayed on through the turn and into the stretch, could not stay with the winner but chased down the stretch securing second place honors. PAT HAND GIRL stalked the leader from the three path, raced in between foes, pushed forward at the three eighths pole was well placed in the stretch but had no late kick. WAIT ON ME stalked the leader from the six path, moved up and joined the leaders at the half mile pole on the outside, continued on through the turn, but had no late rally. SODDY DAISY vied for the lead, raced on the rail, set the pace, saved ground throughout but did not have enough today. WHO DAT GREY raced from mid pack in the two path, slightly improved position and finished even. SIMPLE SUNDAY raced off of the pace in the three path, made no impact. QUALITY BOW raced mid pack in the five path, launched a bid at the half mile pole, but to no avail. GUEST IN MY HEART was off a tad slow, raced on the rail, but showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Soddy Daisy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, rail, led, flattened out at the 1/4, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Crystal Crescent
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w, led, bid 3/8, hand ridden, drew off stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Hand Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Harden Patricia M and Hargrave Randall
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, between, well placed, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Quality Bow
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 5w, bid 1/2, to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Preach It Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 5w, advanced backside, joined leaders 1/2, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Wait On Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 6w, advanced, joined leaders 1/2, asked 3/8, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NON BINDING was off mid pack, raced in the four path, improved position, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, circled the field in a set through the turn, took command at the three sixteenth pole, led down the stretch, held sway. GUANAJUATO was off a bit slow, ran last early, gathered himself together and started to split horses att he half mile pole, continued to gain ground and improve position through the turn as he picked his way through traffic, shifted into the four path in the upper stretch, responded well when asked for more, closed in on the leader with every stride just missing for the win bit ran a games second. CECE WAVE raced in the two and three path, took control of the pace on the front end, raced inside of horses, shifted to the rail in the upper stretch and closed, closing in on the leader with each stride, was caught late by an outside challenger settling for a decent third place finish. LOYAL TO THE CHIEF vied for the lead, raced two wide, took back and stalked, then lost momentum and faded. REINA ACES raced off of the pace early, advanced into mid pack, continued to maintain position and gained ground late. BERNIECE raced in the three path , stalked the leaders, raced tucked in behind horses, briefly lost momentum in the turn and finished flat. DONTFORGETRDREAMS trailed early, mild gain. SAVANNAH'S HERE raced on the our side in the five path, was on the lead, controlled the pace, stopped at the quarter pole. LUCKY GONE SWEET showed brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Berniece
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w, stalked, behind, bid 3/8, lost momentum, flat

ENTRY.NAME: Guanajuato
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, last, split 1/2, advanced turn, 4wupper, encouraged, 2n

ENTRY.NAME: Loyal to the Chief
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, 2w, took back, stalked, lost momentum

ENTRY.NAME: Cece Wave
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w, led, inside, shifted rail upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Non Binding
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w, bid 3/8, circled in set, led 3-16th, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Reina Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, advanced, mid pack, gained late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 1 1/16M Turf CR: 86. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since June 30, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 28, 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. (If deemed inadvisa ble by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 1/16 Miles) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MINT took advantage of the one post position, used his natural speed to take the lead, stayed on the rail through out the race, set moderate fractions as he maintained about a length in front of the rest of the field, comfortably lead into the stretch, had the wire in his sites and finished as the uncontested winner. PHARAOH'S PROPHECY raced in the five path in the middle of the field, improved position late gaining on the outside getting up for second. EGO was off in the middle of the pack, raced in the two path, was patient down the back side, launched a bid a the three eights pole, stayed on the rail through the turn and down the stretch, moved into a three way battle for second as he raced up the rail. LIARS CLUB stalked the leaders, was racing on the rail, had to steady in the first turn, raced even after that. VINYL raced in the four path, stalked the pace, raced in between foes, stayed on point battled late, finished best of the rest. LOVING LUCKY stalked the leader from the three path, was joined by foes and raced between hoses, stayed in the second flight down the stretch, briefly battled, then faltered. SENATOR CON raced from off of the pace in the three path, slightly improved position, maintained through out and raced even. MOUNT KENYA was off a bit slow, was last, made no impact. STEAL IT BACK was of a bit slow, raced on the rail, was in contact with the field in the turn, shifted out five wide in the turn and raced flat. TEMPRANO brief speed, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Mint
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, maintained lead, uncontested winner

ENTRY.NAME: Mount Kenya
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, last, made no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Senator Con
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w, maintained position and raced even

ENTRY.NAME: Ego
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 2w, patient, saved ground, clean trip, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Liars Club
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rail, steadied 1st turn, raced even

ENTRY.NAME: Pharaoh's Prophecy
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 5w, improved late, getting up for second

ENTRY.NAME: Loving Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, raced between, in contention, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Steal It Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, rail, shifted out 5 wide, upper

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 25000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, STATE BRED OR TRIAL OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners O f A Race Since June 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE A HOT MESS settled in hands off of the pace while racing in the three path, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, shifted into the four path in the upper stretch, took control by the three sixteenth pole and drew off from there. HAMAZING DEBATE stalked the pace from the three path, raced in between horses and tucked behind the leaders, lost ground in the turn, was heavily encouraged with a right handed crop near the eighth pole, sent as clear message and responded well finding another gear and closing well for second. PROUD VICTORIA was sharp out of the gate, stumbled while establishing an early position, inched over to the rail, stalked the pace, was joined by another foe and matched strides with that one through the turn and into the stretch, was asked at the eight pole and responded well with a late surge getting up for third. REDEFINITION vied for the lead, briefly led, raced on the rail, stalked the pace saved ground through out, but ran even down the lane. ABBY THE BULL DAWG was off slow and last for the first few calls, saved ground and put in a mild bid late. GETONOUTTAHERE vied for the lead, raced on the rail, settled into a stalking position and tired. LEGENDARY GIFT trailed through out.

ENTRY.NAME: Redefinition
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, stalked, saved ground, ran even

ENTRY.NAME: Getonouttahere
ENTRY.OWNER: Rossi Lee J and Broyles Brandon

ENTRY.NAME: Proud Victoria
ENTRY.COMMENT: shrp, stunbled, rail, stalked, matched, late surge

ENTRY.NAME: Abby the Bull Dawg
ENTRY.OWNER: Wood David and Dunn John Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, last, mild bid late

ENTRY.NAME: Hamazing Debate
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, between, behind, right handed crop 8th, closed

ENTRY.NAME: She a Hot Mess
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w, settled in hands, bid 3/8, 4 wide, upper, drew off 3-16th

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOMBER COMMAND stalked from the two path, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, challenged for the lead at the eighth pole, battled, took the lead at the sixteenth pole, and pulled away for the win. MIDNIGHT HUNTER vied for the lead, settled just off of the pace in the four path, stalked, bid at the three eighth s pole, was at a slight dis advantage in the four path and could not get the lead, was kept to task in the stretch and continued to gain ground, surged past the first leader in the stretch but could not get to the winner and settled for a game second place finish today. JERSEY JIM vied for the lead, took control and led the race from the two path, set the pace, was first to the eighth pole but was quickly caught by a fast closing rival on the rail and then caught by another rival on the outside finishing for third. CLASSIC RUNNER was off to a slow start, was way off of the pace, raced in the four path, found best stride late. COME ON COME ON was off in the middle of the pack, raced in the three path, edged out and circled in the turn in the four path, raced four wide down the stretch and finished even. RAUL'S ENCANTO vied for the lead, took command set the pace while racing on the rail, the gave way the turn. SONGWRITER was off in the middle of the field, raced four wide, moved at the half mile pole, had the widest trip through the turn and down the stretch finishing flat. MIRI A COINCIDENCE was off mid pack, raced on the rail and saved ground, moved at the half, shifted into the three path in the upper stretch, but to no avail. DIRECTIONAL raced off of the pace, raced on the rail but ran flat. MADMARTIGAN trailed through out. DANDY LOU vied for the lead, raced in the two path and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Miri a Coincidence
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, saved ground, moved 1/2, 3 wide, upper

ENTRY.NAME: Bomber Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 2w, bid 3/8, challenged 1/8, battled, led 1/16, pulled a

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, slow start, 4w, best stride late

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Jim
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, battled, caught inside then on the outside, ended up 3

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 25000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, STATE BRED OR TRIAL OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUNAR MODULE raced from the middle of the field in the two path, improved position through the turn, cleared the early leader by the eighth pole ,drew off. U. S. ARMY raced from mid pack, stayed on the rail and came with a late surge running a great second. BLING'S BELLWETHER raced from mid pack, improved position through the turn and closed well. TAPIT'S SPIRIT mid pack, raced on the inside, and finished even. LAURI'S WISH was off in the middle of the field and mad a mild bid late. SIDETOWN flashed brief speed, faded. DRIFTER trailed early, then passed tired foes. FULL IMPACT vied, led, faded. PESO IN MY POCKET vied for the lead, raced in between foes in the three path and flattened out. CREEKMORE flashed early speed and retreated. MISTER K made no impact. RUM 'N TONIC showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Lunar Module
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 2w, advanced, cleared 1/8, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Bling's Bellwether
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, improved position closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Lauri's Wish
ENTRY.OWNER: Stewart, Chad J. and Lenci, Anthony

ENTRY.NAME: Drifter
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early and passed tired foes

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 Mile and 70 Ya rds) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORO NALA wire to wire. PINCHING PENNIES stalked from the three path and closed well getting up for second. MISS ARKANSAS raced from the middle of the field and gained ground consistently getting third place. DR. WOODS MIRACLE was off slow, raced patiently and made one run. LACEY'S STAR raced from mid pack and ran even. NOT ALONE stalked the front runner form the inside but gave way late. LA VALEDORA off slow, mild bid. MRS. MACOMBER trailed early on and passed tired rivals late. GOLD MEMORIES was never involved. HATZILU IVRIT showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Mrs. Macomber
ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell Heath Aaron and Campbell Sheena

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Arkansas
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, mild gain through out

ENTRY.NAME: Hatzilu Ivrit
ENTRY.OWNER: Flores Rafael G and Flores Rafael Q

ENTRY.NAME: La Valedora
ENTRY.OWNER: Gomez Francisco Ramirez and Hernandez Emmett
